location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Map of a section of the Iran-Baluchistan border

mods.abstract: Extract of a map showing the boundary between Iran and Baluchistan, in present-day Pakistan. The map indicates: hydrology; topography, with form lines; settlements; roads; the Iran-Baluchistan boundary. Two arrows drawn in red pencil have been added to the map. The annotation ‘Gwattur Bay’ has also been added to the map in blue ink. The map appears to accompany papers preceding it in the enclosing file, which refer to places indicated on the map, including Pilani Sunt and Kastak, where an alleged territorial infringement by Iranian customs officials took place.
